signs.pattern: NEVER hardcode AI model names (gpt-4, claude-3, gemini, etc) - always use environment variables or settings
Use environment variables for all API keys and secrets, never hardcode them
Always handle loading, error, and empty states for async operations

ALWAYS transform API responses from snake_case to camelCase at the boundary. Create a transform function: `const user = { userName: data.user_name, createdAt: data.created_at }`. NEVER use snake_case properties directly in TypeScript code like `data.user_name` - always map to camelCase first.
Add data-testid attributes to interactive elements for Playwright e2e tests
Never use 'any' type in TypeScript - create proper interfaces and types instead
When removing or modifying UI elements, grep for related tests and update them - stale tests that check for removed elements will fail
